amendment.description: Amendment specifies the boundaries of the San Rafael Western Legacy District. \ As amended by the Boehlert amendment (A002) the boundaries of the San Rafael Conservation Area were expanded to include parts of the Factory Butte and Muddy Creek areas in Wayne County.
amendment.purpose: Amendment printed in H. Rept. 106-654 to specify the boundaries of the Legacy District.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
